member.name: IShellItem.BindToHandler
member.summary: Binds to a handler for an item as specified by the handler ID value (BHID).
member.param: A pointer to an interface on a bind context object. Used to pass optional parameters to the handler. The contents of the bind context are handler-specific. For example, when binding to BHID_Stream, the STGM flags in the bind context indicate the mode of access desired (read or read/write).

member.name: IShellItem.Compare
member.param: A pointer to an object to compare with the existing IShellItem object.
One of the values that determines how to perform the comparison. See SICHINTF for the list of possible values for this parameter.
This parameter receives the result of the comparison. If the two items are the same this parameter equals zero; if they are different the parameter is nonzero.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the items are the same, S_FALSE if they are different, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: IShellItem.GetAttributes
member.summary: Gets a requested set of attributes of the object.
member.param: Specifies the attributes to retrieve. One or more of the SFGAO values. Use a bitwise OR operator to determine the attributes to retrieve.

A pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, contains the requested attributes. One or more of the SFGAO values. Only those attributes specified by sfgaoMask are returned; other attribute values are undefined.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the attributes returned exactly match those requested in sfgaoMask, S_FALSE if the attributes do not exactly match, or a standard COM error value otherwise.

member.name: IShellItem.GetDisplayName
member.summary: Gets the display name of the object.
member.param: One of the values that indicates how the name should look.
A value that, when this function returns successfully, receives the address of a pointer to the retrieved display name.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItem.GetParent
member.summary: Gets the parent of an object.
member.param: The address of a pointer to the parent of an interface.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.
